# Asiatic Moonseed tablets. These tablets are used in [[traditional Chinese medicine]] "to remove toxic ''heat'', to promote subsidence of swelling and soothe sore throat in the treatment of painful swelling of the throat due to ''stagnation of fire-toxin'', acute pharyngitis, and tonsillitis".
